rows.label: tlk400704_msg0001
rows.name:
Looks like you completed it
safely. As expected of you, Rex.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0003
rows.name:
The more missions a mercenary band
completes, the more famous it gets. The
number and types of requests will increase.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0004
rows.name:
The number of Blades you can
manage will also increase.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0005
rows.name: It's all good news.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0006
rows.name:
This time, Yuu-san prepared
the mission for me, but what
should I do from now on?

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0007
rows.name:
Let's see... We'll assign some
missions to you from our end.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0008
rows.name:
Other than that, you can go
around town and talk to people.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0023
rows.name:
There are a lot of people in trouble,
so there are many requests.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0009
rows.name:
It might be a good idea to go
back to Avaritia or Gula.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0010
rows.name: I see, I see...

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0011
rows.name:
Oh, right. I have one more
piece of advice for you.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0012
rows.name:
Missions have various
requirements, and Blades
have different aptitudes.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0024
rows.name:
Compare them carefully and form
your squad. It will shorten the
time needed to complete the mission.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0013
rows.name:
So to be efficient, I need to
think about everyone's strengths.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0014
rows.name: Yes... that's right.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0015
rows.name:
As you complete more missions and get
used to it, we'll gradually entrust more
of the mercenary band's duties to you.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0016
rows.name:
We'll have another test
then, so come back to this
village once in a while.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0017
rows.name:
I was entrusted with this,
but there's a test?

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0018
rows.name:
And if your Blades are ever
idle, send them on missions.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0019
rows.name:
There's a mountain of requests. There are
a lot of people in the world who need a
mercenary's help outside of combat.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0020
rows.name:
I see... So this is the kind of
work Vandham-san was doing.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0021
rows.name:
I'll do my best to make this a
good mercenary band, so I don't
betray Vandham-san's trust.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0022
rows.name:
That's a good attitude, Rex.
We're counting on you for the
future of the mercenary band!
